website_summaries.verdict: The attributes of the Cole Haan GrandPro Running Sneaker with Stitchlite resonated well with its wearers. The brand is known for its high-quality dress sneakers, and this model is an excellent addition to the collection.Its elegant knit upper delivers comfort and breathability while exhibiting an eye-catching design. Versatility-wise, the shoe could be utilized during various activities, from casual workdays to holiday strolls. Overall, its qualities make it worthy to be purchased, despite the $140 retail price tag.
pros: A significant number of shoppers have mentioned that they got compliments from onlookers while wearing the pair
The majority of its purchasers are captivated by the stylish design of the Cole Haan GrandPro Running Sneaker with Stitchlite
A lot of its wearers praise its breathability
The sneakers feel very comfortable, according to many users
Its versatility is apparent, as this casual shoe can be used for walking, running, casual workdays or even while playing basketball, as per a buyer
For many of its customers, the incredibly lightweight aspect of the GrandPro Running Sneaker with Stitchlite is worthy of being commended
A couple of commenters have advised that the shoe looks well when paired with shorts, jeans, khaki, or chinos
According to a few wearers, this lifestyle sneaker could be worn without socks
There is an article about the GrandPro Running Sneaker with Stitchlite which praises the materials used and the intricate process of making it
One wearer is very pleased with the low-top because when he walked for over 6 miles while using it, he did not sustain any blisters
cons: There are some who have commented that the expensive price is a deterrent to appreciate the shoe fully
One commenter feels that the arch support could have been better

customer_reviews.title: Look great in person
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned at least 10 pairs of cole haan oxfords and loafers. I followed the reviews and ordered a half size down from my normal cole haan size and the fit well. 4 stars because there was a bit of fraying in the back of the material already but it doesn’t bother me enough to return. If I had ordered these directly from cole haan I would have returned but the price here was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer12

customer_reviews.title: Light stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very light and are great to wear if your office has a jeans dress code. They are quite breathable, which can be a positive or a negative depending on your needs. I wouldn't say they are good for cold climates because they offer little insulation, but that's not really the purpose. Just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a lifelong cole Haan fan and these are the worst fitting shoes I’ve ever bought from them. Everything about them is off. From the length, to the toe box, to the heel cup. Returned them immediately
customer_reviews.author: J. Groth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the lightness of the shoe and its design and ventilation openings but the size was a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: Mohanad

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely LOVES them. I'm always nervous to buy clothes and shoes without trying them on, but I ordered the same size as my husband's other Cole Haans and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect for summer. Look great and very light. Get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: alan g hott

customer_reviews.title: Grown up sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend; he already had the same pair in blue and they are his favorite shoes. These shoes finally got him to upgrade from his worn out vans! They are great for walking around or a casual night out.
customer_reviews.author: MNSconnieDC

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Except Dye on Leather Came off on Socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have 2 other GranPros. The fit and comfort is perfect. This pair had more brown leather and the dye came off on my socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C. Gupton

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight and ventilated. Since the material is a lot thinner than your usual sneakers from Nike or Adidas, I think it would be better to go half a size smaller. Overall, this would be a great pair of shoes for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper. L

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe that can be casual ir worn to work.
customer_reviews.author: L. Welden

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is light, airy and stylish. I love it! I wear it casually.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Order one half size smaller than your regular shoe size. Great shoe besides the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: One size bigger than usual
customer_reviews.text: I’m 12 and these ones are little big than expected. I will send it back for a 11 and try them
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carlos Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend as a gift and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great style and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great style, lightweight, comfortable for such a light shoe. Tons of compliments the first day I wore.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the box came all broken and i bought the tennis shoes for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Niks

customer_reviews.title: Runs sooo Large and No exchange
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes after I read the reviews. I normally wear 10.5 cole haan shoes. I read that it runs large that’s why I ordered 9.5 size and it is really really large. I have never seen something like that. I tried to contact Cole Haan customer service to exchange it with 8.5 but they don’t do exchanges. I can’t get a refund since I bought the shoes with my Amex credit rewards. So it is a waste of money. I dont recommend this shoes to anyone and I am very very much disappointed with Cole Haan
customer_reviews.author: canbaydar7

product_meta.title: Cole Haan Men's Grandpro Runner Stitchlite Sneaker
product_meta.description: Heritage running sneaker silhouette using our stitch lite material for a cool and extremely comfortable look.
feature_bullets: All over knit sport oxford upper.
Leather covered foot bed for comfort and breathability.
Injection molded EVA outsole for comfort.
Rubber pods in heel and forefoot for traction and durability.
